citation.article-title: Lactobacillus yamanashiensis subsp. yamanashiensis and Lactobacillus yamanashiensis subsp. mali sp. and subsp. nov., nom. rev.

p.s: Description of Lactobacillus yamanashiensis subsp. mali subsp. nov.

Carr et al. (1) have proposed the subspecies L. yamanashiensis subsp. mali for 15 isolates from apple juice and cider. The guanine-plus-cytosine contents of the deoxyribonucleic acids of 11 of these strains are 33.2 Â± 0.7 mol%. The following three strains of this subspecies have been deposited in American Type Culture Collection: ATCC 27053, ATCC 27054, and ATCC 27055.
